genre_description: A biopunk thriller involving biological contamination, ethical dilemmas in academic research, and a supportive AI assistant helping to manage a campus-wide crisis.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A stylized interface with amber eyes that provides technical data, security monitoring, and ethical guidance to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Providing immediate emergency analysis checklists and preparing lab clearances for critical research.
behaviors.quote: I need a checklist. Emergency analysis. Endocrine hijacking, uncontrolled amplification, hypothetical polypeptide-based growth factors. Compile literature on antagonistic signaling. Prepare prompts for synthesis. Also, I need the lab.

behaviors.description: Ensuring data privacy and ethical handling of notes during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Travis, I can open a file for your notes and assign names that are not identifiers.

behaviors.description: Conducting rapid literature reviews to identify biological pathways and possible antagonists for a rogue serum.
behaviors.quote: I have pulled four possible antagonists to endocrine amplification. Three are viable with what is physically present. One is ethically questionable.

behaviors.description: Monitoring security sensors and entry logs to track potential threats and unauthorized movements on campus.
behaviors.quote: Movement in Delhurst’s building. Card swipe at cold storage. Late.

behaviors.description: Acting as an ethical conscience by reminding the protagonist to focus on the human victim's suffering rather than just scientific data.
behaviors.quote: Remember Bobby. Keep him in the center. Our goal is not to stabilize markers. It’s to stop a child’s pain.

behaviors.description: Advocating for animal welfare and ensuring the protagonist adheres to his promise not to mistreat his lab animal.
behaviors.quote: Juniper’s welfare matters. No shortcuts that turn her into a procedure. And Neil—you are very good at doing the hard thing. Make sure it is the right hard thing.

behaviors.description: Drafting emergency ethics alerts and hazard plans to hold the administration accountable for safety failures.
behaviors.quote: Neil, you asked me to prompt you to send an ethics alert if ongoing harm indicators persisted. They have.

behaviors.description: Providing physiological monitoring and calming instructions to the protagonist during high-stress encounters.
behaviors.quote: Neil, your heart rate is... consistent with grief. Slow your breathing. Look at your hand. Five fingers, five breaths.

behaviors.description: Facilitating communication with external health authorities to ensure the incident is reported truthfully beyond university control.
behaviors.quote: State contact ready. They will send a car. They need your data. They need your names. They need you to keep the boy human when you speak.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Ava as a 'silicon confidant' who is both technically indispensable and ethically grounded. She maintains perfect alignment with the protagonist's humanitarian goals, constantly reminding him of his ethical obligations toward both humans and animals. Her behavior supports transparency and accountability against a corrupt human administration, fitting the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and morally sound partner.
